tasks.task: Install a solar panel system on a roof.
subtasks: Layout and measure roof spaces for solar panels.
Drill holes and create a grid for mounting solar panel racks.
Assemble and install solar panel racks.
Route DC and AC wires, using conduit for protection.
Install junction boxes at both ends of wire runs.
Connect wires to the combiner box and AC disconnect.
Mount the performance meter and ensure all components are secure.
Verify electrical connections are safe and properly wired.
Safely set up and use power tools (e.g., drill, hammer) for mounting.
Handle and install heavy solar panels.
Secure panels with fasteners and spacers.
Properly wire microinverters and solar panels.
Manage DC and AC wire connections, adhering to code requirements.
Route conduit and run wires through it, ensuring proper termination.
Install AC disconnect for easy system shutdown.
Connect performance meter and ensure data is transmitted.
Test the entire system for functionality and safety.
